description: An award-winning interactive studio based in Auckland, NZ. Their digital specialists create smart, great-looking digital products that bring people and brands closer together.

description: Marker create enterprise-quality digital products that fundamentally support, strengthen or enhance their clients’ product and service offerings.

name: Matrikon
description: Matrikon provided services for Maximo including implementations, upgrades and support.
At times I was responsible for teaching and delegating work to up to three other developers. When I left I was the senior Maximo developer in the Canadian HQ office.

name: Mitch Olsen
description: Mitch Olsen's purpose is supporting organisations to better understand and leverage the power of behavioural science and digital technology to make a positive difference in the lives of New Zealanders.

name: OSHO International

name: Propellerhead
description: Propellerhead are dedicated to the powerful ideas that make the world a better place for our clients, their users, and our community.

name: Quadratek
description: Quadratek provides complimentary and cohesive end-to-end technology solutions and products, reducing complexity, and improving the reliability of your IT Estate with Consulting, Infrastructure, People and Support.

name: Red Fox Game Studio
description: A game development startup founded by one of my lecturers at Media Design School. Their vision is "one million smiles per day".
I have worked as the primary developer for some of Red Fox's titles.

name: Rush
description: Rush Digital take on the jobs that are too tough for your average development studio. They create games, apps and bespoke systems for leading brands.

During my time at Rush Digital I worked on a wide range of projects. During many of those engagements they were confident enough in my abilities that they gave me whole projects for high profile clients like Fonterra and TVNZ that I then developed on my own with a high level of independence.
